about_the_game:
Arcade air combat - Fly your fighter jet against air and ground enemies in this fast-paced action game. With 50+ jets, 100+ missions and 10+ game modes including dog fighting, close air support and strategic bombing.

50+ Jets - With over 50 jets in the game and more added each month, there is a jet for everyone.

100+ Player Created Missions - With a full mission and terrain editor you can create your own missions and maps and share them with the community. With over 100 player created missions so far and new missions being added each week.

Features Include:

  • Fast-paced arcade air combat with simple controls and a focus on fun and action

  • Cross-platform multiplayer in dogfight and co-op game modes, play with friends on dedicated servers or connect directly in a custom match

  • Regular content updates with suggestions taken directly from the community by the solo developer on the project

  • 10+ Game modes: Dogfight, Beyond Visual Range (BVR), Tutorials, Survivor, Close Air Support, Ship Attack, Bomber Escort, SAM Survival, Time Trial, UFO Attack and Strategic Bomber

  • 50+ Jets: Including F-22, Su-57, A-10, F-14, F-15, F-16, F-35, F/A-18, J-20, MiG-29, Su-25, Su-27, KF-21, F-104 and more

  • Loadout editor lets you chose the weapons for your jet including short, medium and long range missiles, smart and dumb bombs, air-to-surface missiles.

  • Mission Editor: Create your own missions with a built in terrain-editor as well as dozens of objects and hundreds of units to chose from. Setup runways, aircraft carriers and helipads for the player to take-off from and re-arm. A simple event editor allows you to trigger events at certain time or in response to other events

content_descriptors.notes: Air combat with explosions and implied death including aircraft, vehicles and infantry

Arcade air combat - Fly your fighter jet against air and ground enemies in this fast-paced action game. With 50+ jets, 100+ missions and 10+ game modes including dog fighting, close air support and strategic bombing.

50+ Jets - With over 50 jets in the game and more added each month, there is a jet for everyone.

100+ Player Created Missions - With a full mission and terrain editor you can create your own missions and maps and share them with the community. With over 100 player created missions so far and new missions being added each week.

Features Include:

  • Cross-platform multiplayer in dogfight and co-op game modes, play with friends on dedicated servers or connect directly in a custom match

name: Jet Attack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8 or above
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10/11/12-capable GPU (NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750, AMD Radeon R7 260X, or equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 580 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Arcade air combat. Fly your fighter jet against air and ground enemies in this fast-paced action game. With 50+ jets, 100+ missions and 10+ game modes including dog fighting, close air support and strategic bombing. New jets and missions released weekly.
